positive.review:
The beloved flash game from Facebook and mobile is finally back
Great to kill time endlessly grinding new levels and evolutions.
Love the game, I remember playing on facebook a long time ago and just recently got back into it.
Amazing game, really brings back back the memories
Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice Nice
Miscrits is back!! I was a huge fan of the OG game and i'm pumped that its back and even better!

Ths game really same like the old one, almost 99% percent.
Thanks to developer to recreate this game back, now with it inside steam, google play , I hope it never lost again so I can play it until old again and show it to my kids.
Anyway this game really better than any pokemon game i playe to get this feeling back, but pokemon game just not good enough to beat this game for me
This game is about as fun as I remember it being when it was on Facebook. Sometimes battles don't make sense, but I suppose that's lack of knowledge over every move and creature stat ever.
I love Miscrits. The current developers of this game did necromancy ad brought it back from the dead after it was thoght to be lost to time, and i cant thank them enough.
Same as the old game, good nostalgia fix. Did not remember the game being THIS grindy though. Easy to get burntout when ur repeating the same steps over and over, necessary at times.

Miscrits: World of Creatures is a charming adventure RPG that combines creature collecting with strategic battles, set in a magical world. Although the game offers plenty of depth for dedicated players, it is also very easy to learn, making it perfect for beginners who are just entering this type of game.

üéÆ Gameplay and Atmosphere

You begin your journey by exploring vibrant regions‚Äîmystic forests, fiery mountains, ancient caves, etc‚Äîeach filled with unique creatures known as Miscrits. With hundreds of Miscrits to collect, each with its own elements, abilities, and evolutions, the game encourages experimentation and strategy.

Battles are turn-based and simple to understand, yet they still require smart decision-making. Choosing the right Miscrit and the right moment to use its abilities often decides the outcome.

üåü Why the Game Is Appealing

Beginner-friendly gameplay ‚Äì Easy to pick up, intuitive controls, and clear progression.

Huge variety of Miscrits ‚Äì Each creature has unique designs and special powers.

Evolutions and upgrades ‚Äì As your Miscrits level up, they unlock new skills and grow stronger.

Exploration and adventure ‚Äì The world is full of secrets, rare Miscrits, and tough bosses.

Community and PvP battles ‚Äì Challenge other players and test your strategies.

üß≠ Tips for New Players

Catch as many different Miscrits as you can ‚Äì A balanced team helps a lot.

Pay attention to elements ‚Äì Elemental advantages are very important in battle.

Explore every area ‚Äì Many rare Miscrits and rewards are hidden on the map.

Join the community ‚Äì Experienced players often share guides, tips, and strategies.

üèÜ Conclusion

Miscrits: World of Creatures is a fun, colorful, and beginner-friendly RPG that offers both excitement and strategy. Whether you enjoy collecting magical creatures, exploring fantasy worlds, or battling other players, this game has something for everyone. It's easy to get into, rewarding to master, and full of charm.

If you‚Äôre looking for a magical world that‚Äôs simple to start and engaging to play, Miscrits is a great choice.
An enjoyable monster collecting game. Feels like a relic from a past era.
its like if it was facebook games all over again but without the part where facebook games shat itself and died ü§Øü§Ø

It's a pokemon adjacent game, with similar battle mechanics and varied creature art. Overall, quite a good game with plenty of time to invest and miscrits to collect, PvP remains competitive (I.e. Do your research or get stomped), but limited by your highest level, meaning various tiers of gameplay.

Overall, very fun.
True nostalgia and great game from my childhood.
old facebook game. i vote positive strictly from nolstalgia as its too annoying to level up to be honest.
really nice and Chill game to play, also very nostalgic, thanks for relaunching it

The comback of a classic. Enjoyed it 10yrs ago, enjoying it still. You want it casual, it delivers. You want to be competitive, it delivers. You want to play at your own pace, you can. You want to grind to be better than the rest, you can. Just everything about the game provides so much replay value.

I have had dreams about this game until it finallz came back.

God tier game.

Playing Miscrits on Steam feels like opening a time capsule from my childhood. I remember grinding battles on Facebook after school, collecting Miscrits, evolving them, and feeling like every new creature was a treasure. Now, as an adult, seeing it return on Steam is surreal ‚Äî like the game grew up with me.

The updated version keeps the same charm: creature collecting, turn-based battles, exploring Miscria ‚Äî but everything is cleaner, smoother, and more polished. It still has that cozy, nostalgic energy, just with better visuals and more depth. If you loved the original, this feels like coming home to a world you thought was gone.
Love the game, I remember playing on facebook a long time ago and just recently got back into it.
It's Pure nostalgia. The "new" devs are putting every effort in balancing the game, this was overlooked back in the day. You can expect some grind to get those platinums.
Memorable game,day 1 player ,since facebook,10/10 never dissapoints
Very good very nice, childhood goes brrt brrt
I really didn't expect this game to come back after all those years. It's as fun as I remember. Gets pretty grindy by the time you get to Mount Gemma, but it's fine.

I used to play this game back when it was available on Facebook, This brings back such great memories
5/5
Nostalgic Facebook game. Started grinding like crazy. And its also tougher and rewarding than a decade back. Hope they add more content soon.

Holy Nostalgia. 10/10 might even be better than I remember with all the changes they've done to make the game more modern without ruining the nostalgia or how the game plays out. Overall so far its a great experience and I am sure it will even get better with more updates and hopefully more expansions. The only downside is all the microtransactions and the fact that you can pay for a huge advantage over someone who doesn't spend on this game. A good way to fix this issue would be to add more events and more free rewards and turn the microtransactions from resources that can elevate your battle power into premium cosmetics instead.
Just like how I remember I really hope to see the success with this title and how it progresses in the future!

obsessed, EXTREMELY obsessed..... if you like collecting cool or cute creatures this game is 100% for you, although there is bosses so it can be a bit grindy but good time killer!

I‚Äôve been playing Miscrits, and it‚Äôs a fun mix of monster collection and strategic arena battles. Catching and evolving your Miscrits is satisfying, and the variety of types and rarities keeps things interesting. The storyline with the Magicites adds a nice layer of urgency and adventure.
The arena battles are surprisingly deep for a game of this type ‚Äî you really have to think about your strategy and team composition. The game is still evolving, and the developers are clearly active, regularly updating balance and adding new content.
A classic-style mobile RPG where you explore, collect cute creatures (Miscrits), and battle other trainers. Its colorful world and simple turn-based combat are easy to pick up and enjoy.
I used to play this for hours when I was younger. It is still just as solid as I remember it being.
Thank you for bringing the game back from my childhood days. I have a lot of fun playing back then and now =]
PvE is fun if you like collecting creatures, while PVP is too sweaty
Nostalgic, but please add something new as well to the lore.
Brought back memories,very addictive game

Nobody reads my reviews anyway.
I'll throw in a recipe for Varenyky.

Recipe for Potato Dumplings (Varenyky)
Ingredients:
For the dough:
Wheat flour ‚Äì 500 g
Water ‚Äì 200 ml
Egg ‚Äì 1
Salt ‚Äì 1 tsp
For the filling:
Potatoes ‚Äì 1 kg
Onions ‚Äì 2
Lard or butter ‚Äì 50 g
Salt ‚Äì to taste
Ground black pepper ‚Äì to taste
Preparation steps:
Making the dough:
Sifting the flour: Sift the flour into a large bowl.
Making the dough: Add salt and the egg to the flour. Gradually pour in the water, constantly stirring. Knead the dough until it becomes smooth and elastic.
Resting the dough: Wrap the dough in plastic wrap or cover it with a towel and let it rest for 30 minutes.
Preparing the filling:
Boiling the potatoes: Peel the potatoes, cut them into large pieces, and boil until tender in salted water.
Preparing the onions: While the potatoes are boiling, finely chop the onions. Saut√© the onions in lard or butter until golden brown.
Making the potato puree: Drain the potatoes and mash them. Add the saut√©ed onions, salt, and pepper to taste, and mix well.
Forming the dumplings:
Rolling out the dough: Roll out the dough into a thin sheet about 2-3 mm thick. Use a glass or cutter to cut out circles approximately 7-8 cm in diameter.
Forming the dumplings: Place a spoonful of potato filling on each circle of dough. Fold the dough in half and pinch the edges tightly to seal the dumplings.
Cooking the dumplings:
Boiling water: Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add salt.
Cooking the dumplings: Gently drop the dumplings into the boiling water, stirring carefully to prevent sticking. Cook until done (approximately 5-7 minutes after they float to the surface).
Serving:
Removing the dumplings: Remove the dumplings with a slotted spoon and place them on a plate.
Serving: Serve the dumplings hot, optionally drizzling with melted butter, sour cream, or saut√©ed onions.
Enjoy your meal!

negative.review:
I loved Miscrits back in the day. While the new game shakes things up a bit, i find myself with not a lot to do after investing quite a few hours over the last 2¬Ω weeks.
As is often with game like this, you have to do online PvP for certain things. but without MMR or anything, you will always face peoole who just spam the strongest bs you can imagine. since you can actually pay money to (faster/easier) maximize the strength of your critters, as a free player you will always fjnd yourself at the bottom of the barrel. unable to compete in anything. I have collected nearly all miscrits and used strategies for yhe "Global Boss Event". i checked out with a total of 6000 dmg. top dmg dealers wete on the 120.000. and now tell me this game isn't pay to win (from a pvp perspective). so you will always be locked out of enjoyable rewards. it just becomes a creature collector at this point. but sadly the world bosses are partially so overpowered (immune against all forms of "crowd control" and copious debuffs) you have to have specific crits to have a chance. no more "build your favorite team". jt becomes a game of rushing for the next overpowered crit to have a remote chance of progression. and i cannot even fathom how this will play out once the final game comes out.


I love the Miscrits. The game is grindy - but i like it.

But i hate the PvP and that it's just another game that rewards paywplay players constantly and forces me to do PvP stuff for some rewards (even if it's just for a rare Miscrit i'd otherwise have to grind for hours). I would very much appreciate an offline arena. right now, if my daily quest wants me to play arena, i enter a fight and immediately surrender, because i am not watching someone hand me my ass for 10 minutes.
If you can give the miscrit switching atleast 5 turns cooldown and keep the buffs and debuffs while switching, you might be able to balance out the game during PVP
Broken Bulb Studios Better Fuck this new studio. I ain't find shit in this game. Bring Back Broken Bulb Studio.

It's an old game with  anew shine, expect less to do the further into the game you come as they are still releasing a bunch of the stuff there was in the old game. Overall it doesn't quite feel like the game it was, yet does at the same time.

This game is so grindy without paying, it is a whole RNG fiasco from catching, to the miscrits rating, even their bonus stats distribution. Most of good loots/currency you get was through the PVP with ever changing meta to catch up on. Competitive strategies still has purpose but most of it are at the mercy of RNG(especially ability moves with extra rng effect that can turn the table on a pvp match).
This game had a lot of potential they should have made it PAY TO PLAY instead they have to many PAY TO WIN Elements that really ruin this game.

If you're an OG player from 8 years ago when the official game was still a thing... well you are going to not like this one cuz its not the same as the original. The creator created new Miscrits of his taste, some of them have Dark varriants especially the ones which NEVER even had an Dark Variant. I remember when having a Miscrits with more SPEED was good, now here we are creating Miscrits with the lowest SPEED ever possible. Even the stats of the Relics are not the same as the original game.

In basic terms - If you want to enjoy Miscrits like before, this game is not for you cuz its not the same as the original.

it was a good game but please make an update that when a miscrit reaches max level the exp receive will be added to the other miscrits on the team. this way it makes the grinding more efficient. exclude the max leveled miscrits` exp and give it to the rest of the team instead

I'm a fan of taming and F2P games. Even though I was lucky enough to get an exotic miscrit on my first try, I can't recommend this game. The game is short on content but heavy on grind, all of which is designed to be "avoided" with cash. Facing a tough opponent? Just pay to level up. Dont find a good miscrit?  buy a pre-maxed miscrit. While I could overlook those issues, the gameplay itself is simply boring. You just go to a rock or a tree, find a miscrit, fight it for XP, and repeat the same cycle over and over again until you can beat the boss and the the next one and then the next one. It's an absolute grind and a braindead boring game imo.

As an OG player that grew playing it on facebook all the way back in 2011, love the game. The new devs not only have brought back the game but are also working eagerly to bring it to new heights.

But Brash exists, the breeding system needs an overhaul. It does not respect the players time and has consumed countless of everyone's miscrits that they have spent hours searching for. Brash is Netanyahu.
couldnt get pasted making an account, truly a soul-esk game. jk, maybe im dumb

Unable to play the gamne.
When creating an account or trying to link to my steam account it keeps telling me that my user name has lower case letters, numbers and spaces, none of which were true.
If you can give the miscrit switching atleast 5 turns cooldown and keep the buffs and debuffs while switching, you might be able to balance out the game during PVP
Broken Bulb Studios Better Fuck this new studio. I ain't find shit in this game. Bring Back Broken Bulb Studio.

It's an old game with  anew shine, expect less to do the further into the game you come as they are still releasing a bunch of the stuff there was in the old game. Overall it doesn't quite feel like the game it was, yet does at the same time.

It has daily limits, there are only a few stuff for new players and importantly, it lacks gameplay mechanics.

It's an unbalanced game, Arena fights keep searching for adversary for 2 hours and never matches with an opponent, and if somehow does, the fucking opponent is 200 levels higher than me, WHAT THE FUCK IS THIS BULLSHIT? UNBALANCED BULLSHIT GAME, the leveling system is complete bullshit, please make an update that when a miscrit reaches max level the exp receive will be added to the other miscrits on the team. this way it makes the grinding more efficient. exclude the max leveled miscrits` exp and give it to the rest of the team instead. Miscrits never appear, waddles, dark waddles, and all of ghe other rare miscrits never appear, I have fucking spent 10 hours trying to get waddles and feliwhateverthefock it's name is, and in over 2000 fights I HAVE NEVER FOUN D THEM!!! 4.5% Chance my sweet patotie you fucking pieces of shit! RESOURCES ARE TOO HARD TO GRIND, NOT ENOUGH REWARD FOR WINNING BATTLES. ALL IN ALL A GIGANTIC PAIN IN THE ASS MONEY MAKING BS RIDDLED WITH MICROTRANSACTIONS _!_ FUCK YOU!

In basic terms - If you want to enjoy Miscrits like before, this game is not for you cuz its not the same as the original.

But i hate the PvP and that it's just another game that rewards paywplay players constantly and forces me to do PvP stuff for some rewards (even if it's just for a rare Miscrit i'd otherwise have to grind for hours). I would very much appreciate an offline arena. right now, if my daily quest wants me to play arena, i enter a fight and immediately surrender, because i am not watching someone hand me my ass for 10 minutes.

it was a good game but please make an update that when a miscrit reaches max level the exp receive will be added to the other miscrits on the team. this way it makes the grinding more efficient. exclude the max leveled miscrits` exp and give it to the rest of the team instead

I'm a fan of taming and F2P games. Even though I was lucky enough to get an exotic miscrit on my first try, I can't recommend this game. The game is short on content but heavy on grind, all of which is designed to be "avoided" with cash. Facing a tough opponent? Just pay to level up. Dont find a good miscrit?  buy a pre-maxed miscrit. While I could overlook those issues, the gameplay itself is simply boring. You just go to a rock or a tree, find a miscrit, fight it for XP, and repeat the same cycle over and over again until you can beat the boss and the the next one and then the next one. It's an absolute grind and a braindead boring game imo.

As an OG player that grew playing it on facebook all the way back in 2011, love the game. The new devs not only have brought back the game but are also working eagerly to bring it to new heights.

But Brash exists, the breeding system needs an overhaul. It does not respect the players time and has consumed countless of everyone's miscrits that they have spent hours searching for. Brash is Netanyahu.
couldnt get pasted making an account, truly a soul-esk game. jk, maybe im dumb

Unable to play the gamne.
When creating an account or trying to link to my steam account it keeps telling me that my user name has lower case letters, numbers and spaces, none of which were true.
If you can give the miscrit switching atleast 5 turns cooldown and keep the buffs and debuffs while switching, you might be able to balance out the game during PVP
Broken Bulb Studios Better Fuck this new studio. I ain't find shit in this game. Bring Back Broken Bulb Studio.

It's an old game with  anew shine, expect less to do the further into the game you come as they are still releasing a bunch of the stuff there was in the old game. Overall it doesn't quite feel like the game it was, yet does at the same time.

This game is so grindy without paying, it is a whole RNG fiasco from catching, to the miscrits rating, even their bonus stats distribution. Most of good loots/currency you get was through the PVP with ever changing meta to catch up on. Competitive strategies still has purpose but most of it are at the mercy of RNG(especially ability moves with extra rng effect that can turn the table on a pvp match).
This game had a lot of potential they should have made it PAY TO PLAY instead they have to many PAY TO WIN Elements that really ruin this game.
It has daily limits, there are only a few stuff for new players and importantly, it lacks gameplay mechanics.

It's an unbalanced game, Arena fights keep searching for adversary for 2 hours and never matches with an opponent, and if somehow does, the fucking opponent is 200 levels higher than me, WHAT THE FUCK IS THIS BULLSHIT? UNBALANCED BULLSHIT GAME, the leveling system is complete bullshit, please make an update that when a miscrit reaches max level the exp receive will be added to the other miscrits on the team. this way it makes the grinding more efficient. exclude the max leveled miscrits` exp and give it to the rest of the team instead. Miscrits never appear, waddles, dark waddles, and all of ghe other rare miscrits never appear, I have fucking spent 10 hours trying to get waddles and feliwhateverthefock it's name is, and in over 2000 fights I HAVE NEVER FOUN D THEM!!! 4.5% Chance my sweet patotie you fucking pieces of shit! RESOURCES ARE TOO HARD TO GRIND, NOT ENOUGH REWARD FOR WINNING BATTLES. ALL IN ALL A GIGANTIC PAIN IN THE ASS MONEY MAKING BS RIDDLED WITH MICROTRANSACTIONS _!_ FUCK YOU!

If you're an OG player from 8 years ago when the official game was still a thing... well you are going to not like this one cuz its not the same as the original. The creator created new Miscrits of his taste, some of them have Dark varriants especially the ones which NEVER even had an Dark Variant. I remember when having a Miscrits with more SPEED was good, now here we are creating Miscrits with the lowest SPEED ever possible. Even the stats of the Relics are not the same as the original game.

In basic terms - If you want to enjoy Miscrits like before, this game is not for you cuz its not the same as the original.
Donate

I loved Miscrits back in the day. While the new game shakes things up a bit, i find myself with not a lot to do after investing quite a few hours over the last 2¬Ω weeks.
As is often with game like this, you have to do online PvP for certain things. but without MMR or anything, you will always face peoole who just spam the strongest bs you can imagine. since you can actually pay money to (faster/easier) maximize the strength of your critters, as a free player you will always fjnd yourself at the bottom of the barrel. unable to compete in anything. I have collected nearly all miscrits and used strategies for yhe "Global Boss Event". i checked out with a total of 6000 dmg. top dmg dealers wete on the 120.000. and now tell me this game isn't pay to win (from a pvp perspective). so you will always be locked out of enjoyable rewards. it just becomes a creature collector at this point. but sadly the world bosses are partially so overpowered (immune against all forms of "crowd control" and copious debuffs) you have to have specific crits to have a chance. no more "build your favorite team". jt becomes a game of rushing for the next overpowered crit to have a remote chance of progression. and i cannot even fathom how this will play out once the final game comes out.

I would very much appreciate an offline arena. right now, if my daily quest wants me to play arena, i enter a fight and immediately surrender, because i am not watching someone hand me my ass for 10 minutes.
